channel.title: Need Help On my server. Please
channel.description:
I got the testscape up and running :D with the shop and stuff, but do i need an inpu client or somthing to add scripts. as im not sure were to add script to make Horvik sell iteam were would i put this code in to make it work. :D :D
were do i put my script to if u no can u give me an example .... like how to get a person selling somthing.
all i wana is an exaple of were u put the script and a script please

item.title: Need Help On my server. Please
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

You don’t need 3rd party programs to make scripts… Just edit them through your Java Files.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help On my server. Please

item.title: Need Help On my server. Please
item.dc:creator: @Haiku01 Haiku01
item.description:
@Haiku01 wrote:

oh to make a person sell something add this in shops.cfg

shop = 59	@whi@Slayer_Shop				1	1	4149	900	4133	900	4521	900	4134	900	4135	900	4520	900

and open up client java and search for } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop and press enter after WanneShop and add } else if (NPCID == 692) { //Trimming PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 59; //Tribal

Then spawn the npc 692 and trade him then amazing you have a store!

Read full topic
